a propos for definit in algol an extens to algolis propos for ad new data type and oper tothe languag definit mai occur in ani block head andtermin with the block thei ar an integr part ofthe program and ar not fix in the languag eventhe behavior of exist oper mai be redefin the processof text contain defin context featur a replac rule thatelimin unnecessari iter and temporari storag exampl of
